name: Royal Kush
description: Royal Kush by G13 Labs is a king among hybrids, delivering powerful trance-like effects with an earthy, skunky aroma. This balanced hybrid descends from the renowned line of Afghani and Skunk #1, two strains that have gained legendary status among cannabis breeders. Royal Kush’s happy, euphoric relaxation branches out in full-body effects that later ease into deep restfulness conducive for sleep. Patients treating stress, pain, and nausea can benefit from Royal Kush’s potent relief, but less seasoned consumers should take caution with this hard-hitter. This strain has a unique coverage of white pistil hairs, and growers are recommended an 8 to 13 week flowering time for their indoor Royal Kush plants.
descriptionPlain: Royal Kush by G13 Labs is a king among hybrids, delivering powerful trance-like effects with an earthy, skunky aroma. This balanced hybrid descends from the renowned line of Afghani and Skunk #1, two strains that have gained legendary status among cannabis breeders. Royal Kush’s happy, euphoric relaxation branches out in full-body effects that later ease into deep restfulness conducive for sleep. Patients treating stress, pain, and nausea can benefit from Royal Kush’s potent relief, but less seasoned consumers should take caution with this hard-hitter. This strain has a unique coverage of white pistil hairs, and growers are recommended an 8 to 13 week flowering time for their indoor Royal Kush plants.

highlightedReviews.text: Magical...we smoked this kusshhyyyyy lady at full-moon rise over the Red Rocks...dreamy up creative kind peaced out pain relief....oh,creeper alert!...Beautiful mind tranquil body high. Kick back and watch the passing parade...peace...

I bought this in a concentrate in hopes of it being a relaxing strain for my muscular issues caused by fibromyalgia. While I did get a head high, I didn't feel it in my body and it was very short-lived. I didn't get any pain relief from it.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Pineapple Chunk, Jedi Kush, Red Cherry Berry, Jack Wreck, and Royal Kush
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
This week’s new strains are elite varieties developed by esteemed breeders in the cannabis community. From Barney’s Farm comes the sweet-tasting hybrids Pineapple Chunk and Red Cherry Berry. Cali Connection blesses us with Jedi Kush, bred from the indica alliance of Deathstar and SFV OG. Using the legendary genetics of Afghani and Skunk #1, G13 Labs created the balanced and medicinal Royal Kush. Last of all, for our sativa fans, we’ve added Jack Wreck which amps up the intensity of its Jack Herer parent.
Let us know what you think of these newcomers in a strain review!
   1. Pineapple Chunk
Characteristics of Pineapple Chunk:

Indica-leaning hybrid
Cheese and Skunk #1 crossed with Barney’s Pineapple
Breeder: Barney’s Farm
Tangy skunk, earthy cheese, and sweet pineapple aroma
Heavy full-body effects and a fast-paced head buzz
Painkilling and stress-relieving properties
Indoor flowering time of 55 days

   2. Jedi Kush
Characteristics of Jedi Kush:

Indica-dominant strain
Cross between Deathstar and SFV OG
Breeder: Cali Connection
Sour skunk and tangy diesel aroma
Dreamy, euphoric, and cerebrally energizing
Good for pain, PTSD, depression, stress, headaches, and appetite loss
Indoor flowering time of 8 to 9 weeks

   3. Red Cherry Berry
Characteristics of Red Cherry Berry:

50/50 hybrid
Cross between Skunk #1 and Cherry Bomb Indica
Breeder: Barney’s Farm
Flowery, fruity aroma
Balanced head and body effects
Good for pain, sleeplessness, and stress
Indoor flowering time of 60 to 70 days

   4. Jack Wreck
Characteristics of Jack Wreck:

70% sativa
Cross between Jack Herer and Trainwreck
Sweet citrus aroma
Intense kick of cerebral psychoactivity
Good for daytime relief of pain, appetite loss, and inflammation

   5. Royal Kush
Characteristics of Royal Kush:

50/50 hybrid
Cross between Afghani and Skunk #1
Breeder: G13 Labs
Earthy, skunky aroma
Happy, euphoric, relaxing effects
Good for stress, pain, and nausea
Indoor flowering time of 8 to 13 weeks

growInfo.growNotes:
Aroma is best brought out when grown outdoors with organic fertilizers
	Suitable for sea of green (SOG) method
